title: Quantum.Break-LEADER
description:
ABOUT THE GAME

Quantum Break blurs the line between television and gameplay, integrating the two into one seamless, uniquely immersive sci-fi drama experience. This action-packed, fast paced game lets you bend and shape time in order to survive. Master unique powers, bending and warping time to outmaneuver and outwit the enemy. Epic moments of destruction, captured in time, become your playground.

How you play the game shapes a personalized version of the television show. Watching the show gives you strategies and insights that will impact the way you play the game and helps you discover unique content within the game.

Title: Quantum Break
Genre: Action
Developer: Remedy
Publisher: Microsoft
Release Date: April 5, 2016




MINIMUM
OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
DirectX: Version 12
Processor: Intel Core i5-4460, 2.70GHz or AMD FX-6300
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R7 260x 2 GB VRAM
Memory: 8 GB RAM

RECOMMENDED
OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
DirectX: Version 12
Processor: Intel Core i5 4690, 3.9GHz or AMD equivalent
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 390 4 GB VRAM
Memory: 16 GB RAM




1-Unrar
2-Go to game folder and delete: AppxSignature.p7x and TestLicense.xml
3-Start -> Run -> â€œgpedit.mscâ€
4-Computer Configuration -> navigate to: Administrative Templates -> Windows Components -> App Package Deployment
5-Enable the 4 top settings, starting with â€œAllow deployment operations in specific profilesâ€
6-Open â€œAppxManifest.xmlâ€ in a text editor and delete the line with Phone License (11th line)
7-Click your start menu again and type â€œSettingsâ€
8-Click â€œUpdate & Securityâ€ (last item on bottom row to the right)
9-Select â€œFor developersâ€ and make sure the Developer mode radio button is selected
10-Open Powershell with Administrator permissions (UAC)
11-Run: â€œSet-ExecutionPolicy Unrestrictedâ€ and type â€œAâ€, then hit Enter
12-Run: â€œcd C:PathtoMicrosoft.QuantumBreak_1.5.0.0_x64__8wekyb3d8bbweâ€
13-Run: â€œAdd-AppxPackage -Register AppxManifest.xmlâ€
14-Windows Search Quantum Break and open it. When it asks for an Xbox account, login with a Microsoft Account.
15-Playâ€¦

NOTE: Windows 10 OS required. Create a fake Microsoft account to let the game access your live account
